Chahuay is a fairly young community with 18 years of recognition. 
The inhabitants are descendants of Marcaconga, which is known as a district with outstanding history, architecture, and culture.
The closest airports are Anta Airport, Velazco Astete Airport, and Andahuaylas Airport.
